Lyrics: Vivrò fra i miei tormenti e le mie cure,
Direct Translation: I will live between my torments and my cares,
Poetic Translation: I’ll live between my torments and my bad blows,

Direct Translation: in my righteous fury, scornful, wandering;
Poetic Translation: In righteous fury wander, rest denied me.

Direct Translation: I will fear the solitary and dark shadows,
Poetic Translation: I’ll fear the dark and solitary shadows,

Lyrics: che 'l primo error mi recheranno inante,
Direct Translation: so that my first mistake will go inside me,
Poetic Translation: So that my first mistake will crawl inside me;

Lyrics: e del sol che scoprí le mie sventure,
Direct Translation: and the only one [or: the sun] who discovered my misfortunes
Poetic Translation: From the sole seer who perceives my sad woes

Lyrics: a schivo ed in orrore avrò il sembiante.
Direct Translation: I will avoid, and my countenance I will keep in horror.
Poetic Translation: I’ll run and with my face in horror hide me.

Lyrics: Temerò me medesmo; e da me stesso
Direct Translation: I will fear myself; and by myself
Poetic Translation: Fearing me, and because I deeply fear me

Lyrics: sempre fuggendo, avrò me sempre appresso.
Direct Translation: always fleeing, I will always be near myself.
Poetic Translation: Fleeing myself, I will be always near me.
